page.title: 04D Block Landscape
page.content: Our D block is a landscape of rolling hills with a valley in the south.The River Rother runs in the east,curving and twisting. The high land rises to the north of our D block to Nether Handley and Middle Handley.The middle area of the D block is farm land.Barrow Hill sits on the hill.Barrow Hill is a quiet old village that housed workers for the local industries.It looks over a deadly chemical plant.Farms scatter around and two small farming villages are to the north.The scattered around farms are over 300 years old and have unusual names.The woodland is to the north of the block.It is a mixed wood with a large pond.The roads are bumpy and narrow.
